704929f-a.title: Brooklyn: Hicks Street - Pierrepont Street
704929f-a.text:
Hicks Street, west side, at Piegfont Street. The
tree was planted by the highways division of the W. P. A.
June 17, 1936
Works Progress Administration
Five Boroughs Project

706254f-a.title: Brooklyn: Pierrepont Street - Hicks Street
706254f-a.folder: Pierrepont Street & Hicks Street, Brooklyn, NY

706259f-a.title: Brooklyn: Pierrepont Street - Hicks Street
706259f-a.text:
Fierrepont Street, north side, at, adjoining and west of Hicks Street.
Also seen is 176-178 Hicks Street, west side, north of Pierrepont Street.
No. 43 Pierrepont Street, is the corner house, and in 1892 was known as the
Carll Hyde de Silver house. Now (1922) occupied by Dr. Bierhauer.
1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
706259f-a.folder: Pierrepont Street & Hicks Street, Brooklyn, NY

706260f-a.title: Brooklyn: Pierrepont Street - Hicks Street
706260f-a.text:
Pierrepont Street, at the N.E. corner of Hicks Street. A view of the
Samuel Mc Lean house prior to 1908. In 1908 the Florence Court, an apartment
building, was erected on the site, and still stands in 1936.
1904.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
706260f-a.folder: Pierrepont Street & Hicks Street, Brooklyn, NY
